original_text: Behold, the name of the Lord cometh from far, burning with his anger, and the burden thereof is heavy: his lips are full of indignation, and his tongue as a devouring fire:
korean_text: 보라 여호와의 이름이 원방에서부터 오되 그의 진노가 불 붙듯 하며 빽빽한 연기가 일어나듯 하며 그의 입술에는 분노가 찼으며 그의 혀는 맹렬한 불 같으며

sentences.original_text: Behold, the name of the Lord cometh from far
and the burden thereof is heavy
his lips are full of indignation
and his tongue as a devouring fire
